semantic_description: Instrument RabbitMQ message consumption with OpenTelemetry spans that record queue name, message size, and processing time.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.destination
attributes_to_add.value_source: the queue name variable passed to BasicConsume

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.message_payload_size_bytes
attributes_to_add.value_source: the length in bytes of the consumed message body

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.processing_time_ms
attributes_to_add.value_source: elapsed milliseconds measured via a Stopwatch surrounding message handler execution
